textContent: yanis guest house your best marrakesh spot
text1: Escape to a dream vacation and immerse yourself in the tranquil oasis of luxury nestled in one of the most beautiful places in Marrakesh.
revealText: Indulge in life’s simple luxuries at Yanis Guest House, where we’re dedicated to pampering you.
horiScrollTitle1: Embark on a Sensory journey at Yanis Guest House
horiScrollContent1: Upon your arrival at Yanis Guest House, prepare to be enchanted by the seamless blend of surroundings, luxurious materials, and impeccable craftsmanship.
horiScrollContent1_1: Everywhere you gaze, you’ll encounter a grandeur that beckons you to reach out and experience it: the velvety softness of fabrics, the intricate details of sculpted plaster and zellige tilework, and the refreshing coolness of marble.
horiScrollTitle2: Experience Yanis Guest House restaurant: a unique, light, and exclusive scent that delicately lingers, creating an irresistibly delicious atmosphere.
horiScrollContent2: Our simple yet elegant menu of classic Moroccan cuisine, with a distinct Marrakesh touch, adds another dimension to your food experience.
horiScrollContent2_1: Savour local delicacies, get better acquainted with a different list of famous Moroccan dishes and end your dinner on a sweet note with a sumptuous choice of dessert.
horiScrollTitle3: Indulge in Yanis Guest House: A Plethora of Activities Await
horiScrollContent3: Explore Marrakesh’s rugged beauty and let this city shaped by its unique geology and history reveal itself in unexpected ways.
horiScrollContent3_1: It may be the most photographed and photogenic city, but to really understand Marrakesh enroll for an engaging, fascinating, and information-packed tour of the city. It is not just facts, figures and dates, but also a lot of fun moments, trivia, hiking, sailing, shopping and food-pairing.
toReturnTitle: TO RETURN TO Yanis Guest House BACK TIME AND TIME AGAIN.
toReturnContent1: Yanis Guest House thrives on tireless efforts, unwavering employee dedication, continuous self-reflection, and bold yet respectful innovations. This legacy establishment seamlessly blends tradition with modernity, remaining a legendary destination that evolves alongside the present.
toReturnContent2: Our most cherished reward lies in the loyalty of our customers, who return time and again because they feel right at home.
uniqueTitle: Discover the Unique Charms of Yanis Guest House
uniqueContent1: our hospitality is woven into every detail. From your initial visit, we commit to memory of your preferences: the perfect room temperature, your favorite coffee, and the drinks and dishes that delight your senses.
uniqueContent2: so, our attention to detail extends beyond ensuring your comfort during your stay. We also delight in surprising you, creating an experience that remains perpetually fresh and inviting.
